origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Clemente Soto Vélez Cultural and Educational Center

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Material is unprocessed. Please contact rbml@columbia.edu for more information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Clemente Soto Vélez Center Records; Box and Folder; Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University Library.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: The Clemente Soto Vélez Cultural & Educational Center Inc. is a Puerto Rican/Latinx multi-arts cultural institution that has demonstrated a broad-minded cultural vision and inclusive philosophy rooted in NYC's Lower East Side/Loisaida. While focused on the cultivation, presentation, and preservation of Puerto Rican and Latinx culture, we are equally committed to a multi-ethnic / international latitude, determined to operate in a polyphonic manner that provides affordable working space and venues to artists, small arts organizations, emergent and independent community producers that reflect the cultural diversity of the LES and our City.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Single reproductions may be made for research purposes. It is the responsibility of the user to secure permission for publication or use from the appropriate copyright holder.
